verses.verse: The plans <S%H4633><s%> of the heart <S%H3820><s%> belong to man, <S%H120><s%> But the answer <S%H4617><s%> of the tongue <S%H3956><s%> is from the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> the ways <S%H1870><s%> of a man <S%H376><s%> are clean <S%H2134><s%> in his own sight, <S%H5869><s%> But the Lord <S%H3068><s%> weighs <S%H8505><s%> the motives. <S%H7307><s%>
Commit <S%H1556><s%> your works <S%H4639><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> And your plans <S%H4284><s%> will be established. <S%H3559><s%>
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has made <S%H6466><s%> everything <S%H3605><s%> for its own purpose, <S%H4617><s%> Even <S%H1571><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> for the day <S%H3117><s%> of evil. <S%H9567><s%>
Everyone <S%H3605><s%> who is proud <S%H1364><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%> is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> Assuredly, <S%H3027><s%> he will not be unpunished. <S%H5352><s%>

By lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%> iniquity <S%H5771><s%> is atoned <S%H3722><s%> for, And by the fear <S%H3374><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> one keeps <S%H5493><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> from evil. <S%H9563><s%>
When a man's ways <S%H1870><s%> are pleasing <S%H7521><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> He makes <S%H7999><s%> even <S%H1571><s%> his enemies <S%H340><s%> to be at peace <S%H7999><s%> with him.
Better <S%H2896><s%> is a little <S%H4592><s%> with righteousness <S%H6666><s%> Than <S%H4480><s%> great <S%H7230><s%> income <S%H8393><s%> with injustice. <S%H3808><s%> <S%H4941><s%>
The mind <S%H3820><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> plans <S%H2803><s%> his way, <S%H1870><s%> But the Lord <S%H3068><s%> directs <S%H3559><s%> his steps. <S%H6806><s%>
A divine <S%H7081><s%> decision <S%H7081><s%> is in the lips <S%H8193><s%> of the king; <S%H4428><s%> His mouth <S%H6310><s%> should not err <S%H4603><s%> in judgment. <S%H4941><s%>
A just <S%H4941><s%> balance <S%H6425><s%> and scales <S%H3976><s%> belong to the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> the weights <S%H68><s%> of the bag <S%H3599><s%> are His concern. <S%H4639><s%>
It is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> for kings <S%H4428><s%> to commit <S%H6213><s%> wickedness, <S%H7562><s%> For a throne <S%H3678><s%> is established <S%H3559><s%> on righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>
Righteous <S%H6664><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%> are the delight <S%H7522><s%> of kings, <S%H4428><s%> And he who speaks <S%H1696><s%> right <S%H3477><s%> is loved. <S%H157><s%>
The wrath <S%H2534><s%> of a king <S%H4428><s%> is [as] messengers <S%H4397><s%> of death, <S%H4194><s%> But a wise <S%H2450><s%> man <S%H376><s%> will appease <S%H3722><s%> it.
In the light <S%H216><s%> of a king's face <S%H6440><s%> is life, <S%H9132><s%> And his favor <S%H7522><s%> is like a cloud <S%H5645><s%> with the spring <S%H4456><s%> rain. <S%H4456><s%>

How <S%H4100><s%> much better <S%H2896><s%> it is to get <S%H7069><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> gold! <S%H2742><s%> And to get <S%H7069><s%> understanding <S%H998><s%> is to be chosen <S%H977><s%> above <S%H4480><s%> silver. <S%H3701><s%>

The highway <S%H4546><s%> of the upright <S%H3477><s%> is to depart <S%H5493><s%> from evil; <S%H9563><s%> He who watches <S%H5341><s%> his way <S%H1870><s%> preserves <S%H8104><s%> his life. <S%H5315><s%>
Pride <S%H1347><s%> [goes] before <S%H6440><s%> destruction, <S%H7667><s%> And a haughty <S%H1363><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> stumbling. <S%H3783><s%>

It is better <S%H2896><s%> to be of a humble <S%H8217><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> with the lowly, <S%H6041><s%> Than <S%H4480><s%> to divide <S%H2505><s%> the spoil <S%H7998><s%> with the proud. <S%H1343><s%>

He who gives <S%H7919><s%> attention <S%H7919><s%> to the word <S%H1697><s%> shall find <S%H4672><s%> good, <S%H9185><s%> And blessed <S%H835><s%> is he who trusts <S%H982><s%> in the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

The wise <S%H2450><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%> will be called <S%H7121><s%> discerning, <S%H995><s%> And sweetness <S%H4986><s%> of speech <S%H8193><s%> increases <S%H3254><s%> persuasiveness. <S%H3948><s%>

Understanding <S%H7922><s%> is a fountain <S%H4726><s%> of life <S%H9132><s%> to him who <S%H1167><s%> has <S%H1167><s%> it, But the discipline <S%H4148><s%> of fools <S%H191><s%> is folly. <S%H200><s%>
The heart <S%H3820><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%> teaches <S%H7919><s%> his mouth, <S%H6310><s%> And adds <S%H3254><s%> persuasiveness <S%H3948><s%> to his lips. <S%H8193><s%>
Pleasant <S%H5278><s%> words <S%H561><s%> are a honeycomb, <S%H1706><s%> <S%H6688><s%> Sweet <S%H4966><s%> to the soul <S%H5315><s%> and healing <S%H4832><s%> to the bones. <S%H6106><s%>
There <S%H3426><s%> is a way <S%H1870><s%> [which seems] right <S%H3477><s%> to a man, <S%H376><s%> But its end <S%H319><s%> is the way <S%H1870><s%> of death. <S%H4194><s%>
A worker's appetite <S%H5315><s%> works <S%H5998><s%> for him, For his hunger <S%H6310><s%> urges <S%H404><s%> him [on.]
A worthless <S%H1100><s%> man <S%H376><s%> digs <S%H3738><s%> up evil, <S%H9567><s%> While <S%H5921><s%> his words <S%H8193><s%> are as a scorching <S%H9498><s%> fire. <S%H784><s%>
A perverse <S%H8419><s%> man <S%H376><s%> spreads <S%H7971><s%> strife, <S%H4066><s%> And a slanderer <S%H7279><s%> separates <S%H6504><s%> intimate <S%H9017><s%> friends. <S%H9017><s%>
A man <S%H376><s%> of violence <S%H2555><s%> entices <S%H6601><s%> his neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> And leads <S%H1980><s%> him in a way <S%H1870><s%> that is not good. <S%H2896><s%>

He who winks <S%H6095><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%> [does so] to devise <S%H2803><s%> perverse <S%H8419><s%> things; <S%H8419><s%> He who compresses <S%H7169><s%> his lips <S%H8193><s%> brings <S%H3615><s%> evil <S%H9567><s%> to pass. <S%H3615><s%>
A gray <S%H7872><s%> head <S%H7872><s%> is a crown <S%H5850><s%> of glory; <S%H8597><s%> It is found <S%H4672><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> of righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>

He who <S%H750><s%> is slow <S%H750><s%> to anger <S%H639><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the mighty, <S%H1368><s%> And he who rules <S%H4910><s%> his spirit, <S%H7307><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> he who captures <S%H3920><s%> a city. <S%H5892><s%>
The lot <S%H1486><s%> is cast <S%H2904><s%> into the lap, <S%H2436><s%> But its every <S%H3605><s%> decision <S%H4941><s%> is from the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
